name: GoolePlay
description: This API allows you to get information of apps, games, movies or books from goole play store

parameters.name: store
parameters.description: choose in apps, games, movies or books to define the searching field

return: The information including product id, title, link, rating of the product in different items

example.output:
The items in title Recommended for you: 
index1:
product id: com.google.android.gm, title: Gmail, link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.gm, rating: 4.2. 
index2:
product id: com.netflix.mediaclient, title: Netflix, link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.netflix.mediaclient, rating: 4.3.
